physical_appearance: "The image features a set of 7 rectangular flyers and posters. 6 of the 7 items display the words ""aka a cappella intelligent sounds for a discerning generation"". The top 2 items on the left hand side of the photograph contains images of mouths and hands. The other 5 items consists of drawings that create the outlines of people as well as musical notes.
